summary: THE FRONT ROTORS WERE REPLACED TWICE, AND THERE WAS STILL A PROBLEM WITH THE BRAKING SYSTEM NOT WORKING EFFECTIVELY.  *JB  ON THE SECOND OCCASION THE BRAKE LIGHT HAD COME ON AND THE CONSUMER WAS TOLD THAT THE BRAKE LINES HAD RUSTED.  THE MANUFACTURER DECLINED ON COVERING THE REPAIRS.  *SCC  REFERENCED IN RQ03-004
